title: Garnier Ultra-Lift Pro Gravity Defying Cream, Intensive, 1.5-Ounce
description: Is it right for me? Over time, collagen breaks down causing the skin on the face and neck to become thin and less firm, leading to loss of definition. Ultra-lift pro gravity defying cream is right for you if you want a daily moisturizer that actually lifts and resculpts to help restore youthful shape to cheeks, jawline and neck. How is it different? Garnier nutritioniste ultra-lift pro gravity defying cream combines our unique pro-tense technology with exclusive "skin-nutrients" to create a network for a natural lifting effect. Tightens and tones. Results: instantly: skin feels hydrated, smoother and firmer. In 4 weeks: cheeks, jawline and neck look resculpted and deep wrinkles appear diminished. With continued use: skin appears lifted and youthful look to cheeks, jawline and neck is restored."skin-nutrient"+ facts. Ultra-lift pro with: beech tree extract, reinforces natural structure of the skin++. Omega 3 + 6, rebuilds skin's protective barrier. Soy protein, boosts natural collagen production. Dermatologist tested for safety. Non-comedogenic - won't clog pores. Gentle to skin. Allergy tested. Non-greasy.based on consumer evaluation. +ingredient complexes developed exclusively by garnier to work on skin's outer layer. ++skin's upper layers.
